metadata.title: CVE-2020-25672 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leak vulnerability was found in Linux kernel in llcp_sock_connect

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1072.78').
